parameters.jsCode:
// Validate and prepare business documents for AI analysis
const inputData = $('ğŸ“‹ Document Upload Trigger').item.json;

const companyName = inputData.company_name || 'Your Company';
const documents = inputData.documents || [];

// Validate required inputs
const requiredDocs = ['mission_vision_values', 'brand_guidelines', 'resource_inventory'];
const providedDocs = documents.map(doc => doc.type);
const missingDocs = requiredDocs.filter(req => !providedDocs.includes(req));

// Prepare AI analysis prompt with Business OS Builder template
const businessOSPrompt = `##############################################
# BUSINESS OPERATING SYSTEM BUILDER
##############################################

COMPANY_NAME = "${companyName}"

You are running in "Memory-Miner & Operating-System Architect" mode.
Analyze the provided business documents and create a complete Business Operating System (B-OS) using the systematic 0-9 framework.

ğŸ—ï¸ INPUT DOCUMENTS:
${documents.map((doc, i) => `${i+1}. ${doc.type}: ${doc.content?.substring(0, 200)}...`).join('\n')}

ğŸ“ OUTPUT SPECIFICATION:
Deliver one comprehensive Business Operating System with 0-9 numbered hierarchy.
For every domain include:
- Definition (â‰¤ 25 words)
- Current State Assessment
- Next Action (owner Â· verb Â· due date < 90 days)
- Key Resources/Tools
- Success Metrics

ROOT: BUSINESS OPERATING SYSTEM FOR ${companyName.toUpperCase()}
â”œâ”€ 0. FOUNDATION
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 0.1 Vision, Mission & Values
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 0.2 Legal Entity & Governance
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 0.3 Core Offer Definition
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 0.4 Brand Identity & Guidelines
â”‚  â””â”€ 0.5 Strategic OKRs & Metrics
â”‚
â”œâ”€ 1. MARKET INTELLIGENCE & POSITIONING
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 1.1 Target Customer Personas
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 1.2 Competitive Landscape Analysis
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 1.3 Market Positioning Strategy
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 1.4 Value Proposition Framework
â”‚  â””â”€ 1.5 Market Research & Insights
â”‚
â”œâ”€ 2. GROWTH ENGINE
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 2.1 Marketing Strategy & Channels
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 2.2 Content & Messaging Framework
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 2.3 Lead Generation Systems
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 2.4 Conversion Optimization
â”‚  â””â”€ 2.5 Growth Metrics & Analytics
â”‚
â”œâ”€ 3. SALES PIPELINE
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 3.1 Sales Process & Methodology
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 3.2 CRM & Pipeline Management
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 3.3 Pricing & Proposal Framework
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 3.4 Customer Acquisition Costs
â”‚  â””â”€ 3.5 Revenue Forecasting
â”‚
â”œâ”€ 4. DELIVERY & CUSTOMER SUCCESS
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 4.1 Service/Product Delivery Process
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 4.2 Quality Assurance Framework
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 4.3 Customer Support Systems
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 4.4 Success Metrics & NPS
â”‚  â””â”€ 4.5 Retention & Expansion Strategy
â”‚
â”œâ”€ 5. PRODUCT & INNOVATION
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 5.1 Product Development Process
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 5.2 Feature Roadmap & Prioritization
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 5.3 User Research & Feedback Loops
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 5.4 Innovation Pipeline
â”‚  â””â”€ 5.5 Technical Architecture
â”‚
â”œâ”€ 6. FINANCE & ADMINISTRATION
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 6.1 Financial Planning & Budgeting
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 6.2 Accounting & Bookkeeping
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 6.3 Legal & Compliance
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 6.4 Insurance & Risk Management
â”‚  â””â”€ 6.5 Vendor & Contract Management
â”‚
â”œâ”€ 7. PEOPLE & CULTURE
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 7.1 Organizational Structure
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 7.2 Hiring & Onboarding Process
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 7.3 Performance Management
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 7.4 Culture & Values Implementation
â”‚  â””â”€ 7.5 Knowledge Management
â”‚
â”œâ”€ 8. TECHNOLOGY STACK & INFRASTRUCTURE
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 8.1 Core Technology Architecture
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 8.2 Development & Deployment Pipeline
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 8.3 Security & Data Protection
â”‚  â”œâ”€ 8.4 Integration & API Management
â”‚  â””â”€ 8.5 Technology Roadmap
â”‚
â””â”€ 9. GOVERNANCE & CONTINUOUS IMPROVEMENT
   â”œâ”€ 9.1 Business Process Documentation
   â”œâ”€ 9.2 Performance Metrics & KPIs
   â”œâ”€ 9.3 Regular Review & Optimization
   â”œâ”€ 9.4 Stakeholder Communication
   â””â”€ 9.5 Strategic Planning Process

âœ… QUALITY REQUIREMENTS:
- No placeholders - every node must reference concrete, actionable items
- Use information from provided documents where available
- Fill gaps with industry best practices for the business type
- Include specific tools, processes, and timelines
- Return exactly one cohesive markdown document
- Focus on practical implementation over theory

Analyze the business documents and generate this complete B-OS structure now.`;

const analysisData = {
  company_name: companyName,
  documents_provided: documents.length,
  missing_documents: missingDocs,
  validation_status: missingDocs.length === 0 ? 'complete' : 'partial',
  ai_prompt: businessOSPrompt,
  timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
  
  // Prepare document content for AI
  document_content: documents.map(doc => ({
    type: doc.type,
    content: doc.content,
    length: doc.content?.length || 0
  })),
  
  // Analysis configuration
  analysis_config: {
    max_tokens: 4000,
    temperature: 0.3,
    model_instruction: 'Generate comprehensive, actionable Business Operating System structure'
  }
};

console.log(`ğŸ—ï¸ Preparing B-OS analysis for: ${companyName}`);
console.log(`ğŸ“‹ Documents: ${documents.length}, Missing: ${missingDocs.length}`);

return [{ json: analysisData }];

parameters.name: messages
parameters.value: =[{"role": "system", "content": "You are an expert business architect specialized in creating systematic organizational structures. Generate comprehensive, actionable business frameworks."}, {"role": "user", "content": "{{ $json.ai_prompt }}"}]
